text: Little Secrets (Perl oder Pica) is a 2006 Luxembourgian Austrian drama movie directed by Pol Cruchten and starring Ben Hoscheit, Anouk Wagener, Thierry van Werveke, Andr√© Jung. ==Other websites== * Category:2006 drama movies Category:2000s Luxembourgian movies Category:Luxembourgian drama movies Category:Austrian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Pol Cruchten
